PayCalc
code: function PayCalc(e,l,t){var a=Math.pow(1+(l/=1200),t);return e*l*a/(a-1)}

name: PVCalc
code: function PVCalc(e,l,t){var a=Math.pow(1+(l/=1200),t);return e*(a-1)/(l*a)}

name: TermCalc
code: function TermCalc(e,l,t){var a=l/(l-e*(t/=1200));return a<0?-1:Math.log(a)/Math.log(1+t)}
